1522520.name: KowloonVR
1522520.description:
KowloonVR is a shared virtual world, built cooperatively by the community. Add from a set of stock models, models other users have created, or make your own, then upload what you've built to the entire world! Custom models can be created in Unity, complete with scripts and animations. It's simple to reuse models and behaviors, allowing people with little to no experience to contribute easily.

Unlike many other virtual realities with user-generated content, KowloonVR consists of a single, contiguous world. Users can build in any part of the world, and any changes they make will be automatically downloaded by others. KowloonVR is moderated, so no malicious or illegal content can be shared.

Download the Latest Version Free

KowloonVR can be downloaded for free from GitHub
It will be released on Steam in early access soon

Learn More

More in-depth information can be found on GitHub

Join the Community!

Discord and Subreddit (r/KowloonVR)
